com.facebook.buck.shell

Class CrossPlatformTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.shell.CrossPlatformTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddsToRuleKey, Tool

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
 @Generated(value="org.immutables.processor.ProxyProcessor")
 @Immutable
 @CheckReturnValue
public final class CrossPlatformTool
extends Object
    A Tool that delegates to different underlying tools depending on the host Platform it is run on.

    When calculating rule keys, this tool yields the same value regardless of the host platform, and - in consequence - the underlying tool it delegates to.
